This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Test stopping one MediaStream's tracks silences only its detector (cloned tracks)
  assert_true: Detector in context with rate 32000 should have no input after operation. expected true got false
[FAIL] Test stopping one MediaStream's tracks silences all detectors (shared tracks)
  assert_true: Detector in context with rate 32000 should have no input after operation. expected true got false
Harness: the test ran to completion.
